mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (member_id, member_password, member_name, member_age, member_gender, member_email, member_address) values(#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberAge}, #{memberGender}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberAddress})
mapper.select: select sf.store_file_system_name , s.store_number , s.store_title , s.store_price from tbl_store s join tbl_store_file sf on s.store_number = sf.store_number and s.store_number = #{storeNumber}
